sentences.en: A dazzling array of celebrities are expected at the Mayfair gallery to see the pictures.
sentences.cn: 梅费尔美术馆期待星光璀璨的各界名流来欣赏这些画。

sentences.en: a dazzling display of football skills
sentences.cn: 让人眼花缭乱的足球技巧表演

sentences.en: Every tree, wall and fence stood out against dazzling white fields.
sentences.cn: 每棵树、每堵墙和每道栅栏都在白得耀眼的田野映衬下十分夺目。

sentences.en: He gave Alberg a dazzling smile.
sentences.cn: 他冲着阿尔伯格粲然一笑。

sentences.en: He has clear blue eyes and a dazzling smile.
sentences.cn: 他有一双清澈的蓝眼睛和一脸灿烂的微笑。

sentences.en: He pointed out to her the dazzling fittings of the coach.
sentences.cn: 他向她指点着车厢里那许多令人眼花缭乱的装饰.

sentences.en: He shielded his eyes against the dazzling declining sun.
sentences.cn: 他用手遮挡眼前落日耀眼的余晖。

sentences.en: He was strapped into a chair surrounded by dials, under dazzling lights.
sentences.cn: 他给绑在一把椅子上,四周都有仪表, 灯光强得耀眼.

sentences.en: I can not see because the light is dazzling me.
sentences.cn: 因为光线使我眼花,所以我看不见.

sentences.en: It has the dazzling red of a sheet of flame.
sentences.cn: 简直象一片火,红得耀眼.

sentences.en: The girl flashed a dazzling smile at the television crew and cameras bearing down on her.
sentences.cn: 这个女孩对着向她围拢的电视台工作人员和摄影机灿烂一笑。

sentences.en: The light reflecting off the snow was dazzling.
The sky is clear and blue, the sunlight dazzling.
sentences.cn: 蔚蓝天空, 阳光灿烂.

sentences.en: Victoria stood out as a dazzling non-conformist.
sentences.cn: 维多利亚以令人惊叹的打破陈规者的形象而引人注目。

words.tran_cn: 头昏眼花地；恍惚地；眼花缭乱地
使茫然；使眼花缭乱；使晕眩

trans.tran_cn: 耀眼的，光彩夺目的，灿烂的
trans.tran_en: a light that is dazzling is very bright and makes you unable to see properly for a short time
